hints.label: lem-spatial-score-log-derivative-appendix
hints.title: Spatial Score as Logarithmic Derivative
hints.content:
2328: :label: lem-spatial-score-log-derivative-appendix
2329: 
2330: For the emergent metric $g_{ab}(x) = H_{ab}(x) + \epsilon_\Sigma \delta_{ab}$ where $H_{ab} = \partial^2 V_{\text{fit}} / \partial x^a \partial x^b$:
2331: 
2332: $$
2333: g^{ab} \frac{\partial g_{ab}}{\partial x^c} = \frac{\partial}{\partial x^c} \log \sqrt{\det g(x)}
2334: $$
hints.raw_directive:
2325: We now prove the connection rigorously using the Jacobi formula for metric determinants.
2326: 
2327: :::{prf:lemma} Spatial Score as Logarithmic Derivative
2328: :label: lem-spatial-score-log-derivative-appendix
2329: 
2330: For the emergent metric $g_{ab}(x) = H_{ab}(x) + \epsilon_\Sigma \delta_{ab}$ where $H_{ab} = \partial^2 V_{\text{fit}} / \partial x^a \partial x^b$:
2331: 
2332: $$
2333: g^{ab} \frac{\partial g_{ab}}{\partial x^c} = \frac{\partial}{\partial x^c} \log \sqrt{\det g(x)}
2334: $$
2335:

hints.label: unlabeled-proof-50
hints.content:
2339: :::{prf:proof}
2340: 
2341: The Jacobi formula states:
2342: 
2343: $$
2344: \frac{\partial \log \det g}{\partial x^c} = \text{Tr}\left(g^{-1} \frac{\partial g}{\partial x^c}\right) = g^{ab} \frac{\partial g_{ab}}{\partial x^c}
2345: $$
hints.raw_directive:
2337: :::
2338: 
2339: :::{prf:proof}
2340: 
2341: The Jacobi formula states:
2342: 
2343: $$
2344: \frac{\partial \log \det g}{\partial x^c} = \text{Tr}\left(g^{-1} \frac{\partial g}{\partial x^c}\right) = g^{ab} \frac{\partial g_{ab}}{\partial x^c}
2345: $$
2346:
